title: Cheesy quesadillas with tomato, red pepper and avocado salsa
description: These quick quesadillas make a cracking crowdpleaser and only take half an hour to make.
ingredients: Finely grated zest and juice of 1 lime

method.Step 1: Mix the avocados, cherry tomatoes, coriander, shallot, the zest and juice of 1 lime, 1 tbsp olive oil and plenty of salt and pepper in a bowl.

method.Step 2: In another bowl, mix together the cheddar, roasted red peppers, chipotle chilli flakes and some black pepper. Divide the mixture between 2 small corn tortillas and top with 2 more small corn tortillas.

method.Step 3: Heat a dry frying pan over a medium heat and toast the quesadillas for 2 minutes on each side until golden, crisp and oozy. Cut the quesadillas into wedges and serve with the salsa and soured cream.
